text: The 2015–16 Azadegan League was the 25th season of the Azadegan League and 15th as the second highest division since its establishment in 1991. The season featured 15 teams from the 2014–15 Azadegan League, two new teams relegated from the 2014–15 Persian Gulf Pro League: Paykan and Naft Masjed Soleyman and two new teams promoted from the 2014–15 League 2: Aluminium Arak as champions and Kheybar Khorramabad. Khooneh be Khooneh replaced Bahman Shiraz while Machine Sazi replaced Shahrdari Tabriz. The league started on 17 August 2015 and ended on 16 May 2016. Paykan won the Azadegan League title for the second time in their history. Paykan, Machine Sazi and Sanat Naft promoted to the Persian Gulf Pro League. == Teams == === Stadia and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Team !City !Venue !Capacity |- | Aluminium Arak || Arak || Imam Khomeini || style="text-align:center;"|15,000 |- | Aluminium Hormozgan || Bandar Abbas || Persian Gulf || style="text-align:center;"|20,000 |- | Damash Gilan || Rasht || Dr. Azodi || style="text-align:center;"|11,000 |- | Fajr Sepasi || Shiraz ||Hafezieh || style="text-align:center;"|15,000 |- | Foolad Yazd || Yazd ||Shahid Nassiri || style="text-align:center;"|6,000 |- | Giti Pasand || Isfahan || Daneshgah Azad || style="text-align:center;"|9,000 |- | Gol Gohar || Sirjan || Gol Gohar Sport Complex || style="text- align:center;"|3,200 |- | Iranjavan || Bushehr || Shahid Beheshti || style="text-align:center;"|15,000 |- | Kheybar Khorramabad || Khorramabad || Takhti Khorramabad || style="text-align:center;"|10,000 |- | Khooneh be Khooneh || Babol || Haft-e Tir || style="text-align:center;"|6,000 |- | Machine Sazi || Tabriz || Bagh Shomal || style="text-align:center;"|20,000 |- | Mes Kerman || Kerman || Shahid Bahonar|| style="text-align:center;"|15,430 |- | Mes Rafsanjan || Rafsanjan || Shohadaye Noushabad || style="text- align:center;"|5,000 |- | Naft Masjed Soleyman || Masjed Soleyman || Behnam Mohammadi|| style="text-align:center;"|8,000 |- | Nassaji Mazandaran || Qaem Shahr || Vatani || style="text-align:center;"|15,000 |- | Parseh Tehran || Tehran || Kargaran || style="text-align:center;"|5,000 |- | PAS Hamedan || Hamedan || Qods|| style="text-align:center;"|8,000 |- | Paykan || Tehran || Shahre Qods|| style="text-align:center;"|25,000 |- | Sanat Naft || Abadan || Takhti Abadan|| style="text-align:center;"|22,000 |- | Shahrdari Ardabil || Ardabil || Ali Daei Takhti Ardabil || style="text-align:center;"|20,000 3,000 |- |} ===Number of teams by region=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
